name: Revisiting the relationship between farmland prices and soil quality

author.name: Luise Meissner
author.affiliation: Department of Agricultural Economics and Rural Development, University of Goettingen

author.name: Oliver Musshoff
author.affiliation: Department of Agricultural Economics and Rural Development, University of Goettingen

publisher.name: Oxford University in association with European Agricultural and Applied Economics Publications Foundation
Oxford University in association with European Agricultural and Applied Economics Publications Foundation

abstract: This paper aims to examine the relationship between soil quality and farmland prices over time. Soil quality is often used as an explanatory variable for farmland prices in hedonic price models. However, the agricultural land market has shown an enormous price increase over the last decade. Therefore, revisiting the relationship between soil quality and farmland prices over time is of high relevance. This study aims to analyze farmland price time series in Germany. The series are aggregated within soil quality intervals and within parcel size intervals, treated as panel units. The fully modified ordinary least squares (FMOLS) panel group mean and the dynamic ordinary least squares (DOLS) panel group mean estimators are applied within a cointegration regression approach to estimate the relation of the time series. We found that soil quality causes a relative farmland price difference within an identified long-run relationship.

dataset.name: German Farmland Price Time Series
dataset.description: Aggregated farmland price time series from 1991 to 2020 within Germany, aggregated within soil quality intervals and parcel size intervals.

variable_measured.name: Farmland Price
variable_measured.description: Average price of farmland within specified intervals.

variable_measured.name: Soil Quality Index (SQI)
variable_measured.description: Index measuring soil quality from 1 to 120.

dataset.conditions_of_access: Available in the GENESIS database of the Statistical Office of Germany
